intervals.cooldownTooltip: After removing files, qui waits about 5 minutes before running Free Space deletes again so qBittorrent can refresh disk free space.
intervals.cooldownWarning: Effective minimum is about 5m because of cooldown

groups.title: Grouped condition groups
groups.tooltip: GROUP_SIZE and IS_GROUPED select a grouping on each condition row. Define optional custom groups here for those selectors.
groups.description: Choose the group directly on each GROUP_SIZE / IS_GROUPED row. Built-ins are always available; custom groups below are optional.
groups.customTitle: Custom groups (available in grouped condition selectors and action group IDs)

crossSeedContentPath.label: Cross-seed (content path)
crossSeedContentPath.description: Group torrents with the same content path

crossSeedContentSavePath.label: Cross-seed (content + save path)
crossSeedContentSavePath.description: Group torrents with the same content path and save path

releaseItem.label: Release item
releaseItem.description: Group torrents with the same content type and effective name

trackerReleaseItem.label: Tracker release item
trackerReleaseItem.description: Group torrents from the same tracker with the same content type and effective name

hardlinkSignature.label: Hardlink signature
hardlinkSignature.description: Group torrents sharing the same physical files via hardlinks (requires local filesystem access)

tagActions.title: Tag actions
tagActions.derivedFromTrackerDescription: Torrents will be tagged with their tracker name
tagActions.replaceModeInfo: Replace mode fully resets these tags in the client before applying this rule.
tagActions.managedModeInfo: Managed mode keeps tags accurate with diff updates. Full sync adds tags to matches and removes them from non-matches.
tagActions.displayNameTooltip: Use friendly names from Tracker Customizations instead of raw domains (for example, MyTracker instead of tracker.example.com).
tagActions.multipleHint: Use multiple tag actions when you need different modes in one workflow (for example, add one tag and remove another).

category.skipIfCrossSeedInCategories: Skip if cross-seed exists in categories
category.skipTooltip: Useful with *arr import queues: prevents automation from moving torrents if at least one related torrent is in the *arr import queue.
category.skipDescription: Skips the category change if another torrent pointing to the same on-disk content is already in one of these categories.

externalProgram.failedLoad: Failed to load external programs. Please try again.

delete.keepFilesDisabledTooltip: Disabled when Free Space is used. Keep-files mode cannot satisfy a free-space target because no disk space is freed.
delete.includeHardlinkedTooltip: Also delete torrents that share the same files via hardlinks. Only hardlinks fully inside qBittorrent are included; hardlinks outside are never followed.
delete.localAccessRequiredTooltip: Requires Local Filesystem Access in instance settings.

move.skipIfCrossSeedsDontMatch: Skip if cross-seeds don't match the rule conditions
move.skipTooltipAria: About skipping move if cross-seeds exist
move.skipTooltip: Skips the move if other torrents in the same cross-seed group do not match this rule. Otherwise all cross-seeds are moved, even if they do not match.

freeSpace.title: Free space source
freeSpace.tooltip: Choose where free space is read from. Default uses qBittorrent-reported free space. Path on server checks a specific disk or mount point.

source.pathOnServerUnsupported: Path on server (not supported on Windows)

freeSpace.pathHelp: Enter the path to check free space on (for example, a mount point).

errors.windowsUnsupported: Path-based free space source is not supported on Windows.
errors.switchToDefault: Switch Free space source to Default (qBittorrent)
errors.localAccessRequired: Path-based free space source requires Local Filesystem Access.
errors.enableLocalAccess: Enable Local Filesystem Access in instance settings, or use Default (qBittorrent).
errors.pathRequired: Path is required when using Path on server.
errors.enterPath: Enter a path or switch Free space source back to Default (qBittorrent).

livePreview.title: Live impact preview
livePreview.addConditions: Add conditions to preview impacted torrents.

dryRun.panelDescription: Latest run from this editor. No need to leave this dialog.
dryRun.noRowsYet: No dry-run activity rows available yet.

summaries.tagsAddedRemoved: {{added}} would be tagged, {{removed}} would be untagged

messages.activityPending: Dry-run completed, but activity details are not available yet.
messages.noActivityIds: Dry-run completed, but no activity IDs were returned.

preview.loadingInitial: Loading preview. This might take a while...

tabDescriptions.needed: These are the torrents that would be removed now to reach your free-space target.
tabDescriptions.eligible: These are all torrents this rule could remove while free space is low.

previewDialog.deleteEnabledImpact: This rule will affect {{count}} currently matching torrents.
previewDialog.deleteDisabledImpact: {{count}} torrents would match this rule if enabled.
previewDialog.categoryImpact: This rule will move {{direct}} direct torrents and {{crossSeeds}} cross-seeds to category "{{category}}".
previewDialog.noMatches: No torrents currently match this rule.
previewDialog.confirmSaveEnable: Confirming will save and enable this rule.

activityRun.title: {{action}} run
activityRun.dryRunNote: Dry run: no changes were applied.
activityRun.noTorrents: No torrents recorded for this run.

states.empty: No automations yet. Add one to start enforcing per-tracker limits.

deleteDialog.title: Delete rule
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

header.title: Workflows
header.noInstances: No instances configured. Add one in Settings to use this service.
header.tooltip: Condition-based automation rules. Actions: speed limits, share limits, pause, resume, delete, tag, and category changes. Match torrents by tracker, category, tag, ratio, seed time, size, and more. Cross-seed and hardlink aware, so you can delete or move safely without losing shared files.
header.description: Automate torrent management with conditional rules.

states.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search term or clear the filter.
states.activityAppearsHere: Events will appear here when automations delete torrents.

preview.enableCategoryDescription: Enabling "{{name}}" will move {{direct}} direct torrents and {{crossSeeds}} cross-seeds to category "{{category}}".
preview.enableDeleteDescription: Enabling "{{name}}" will affect {{count}} torrents that currently match.
preview.confirmEnablesImmediately: Confirming will enable this rule immediately.

importDialog.title: Import Workflow
importDialog.description: Paste a workflow JSON to import. The workflow will be created disabled and appended to the end.

activity.searchPlaceholder: Filter by name, hash, or rule...

clearDialog.title: Clear Activity History
clearDialog.description: Delete activity history older than the selected period. This action cannot be undone.

header.title: Workflows
header.noInstances: No instances configured. Add one in Settings to use this service.
header.tooltip: Condition-based automation rules. Actions: speed limits, share limits, pause, resume, delete, tag, and category changes. Match torrents by tracker, category, tag, ratio, seed time, size, and more. Cross-seed and hardlink aware, so you can delete or move safely without losing shared files.
header.description: Automate torrent management with conditional rules.

states.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search term or clear the filter.
states.activityAppearsHere: Events will appear here when automations delete torrents.

preview.enableCategoryDescription: Enabling "{{name}}" will move {{direct}} direct torrents and {{crossSeeds}} cross-seeds to category "{{category}}".
preview.enableDeleteDescription: Enabling "{{name}}" will affect {{count}} torrents that currently match.
preview.confirmEnablesImmediately: Confirming will enable this rule immediately.

importDialog.description: Paste a workflow JSON to import. The workflow will be created disabled and appended to the end.

activity.searchPlaceholder: Filter by name, hash, or rule...

clearDialog.title: Clear Activity History
clearDialog.description: Delete activity history older than the selected period. This action cannot be undone.

header.title: Automatic Tracker Reannounce
header.tooltip: qBittorrent does not retry failed announces quickly. When a tracker is slow to register a new upload or returns an error, you can end up waiting. qui handles this automatically without spamming trackers.
header.descriptionSuffix: torrents and reannounces them when no tracker is healthy.
header.fullDescription: qui monitors <stalled>{{stalledLabel}}</stalled> torrents and reannounces them when no tracker is healthy. Background scan runs every {{seconds}} seconds.

initialWait.label: Initial Wait
initialWait.tooltip: How long to wait after a torrent is added before checking status. This gives the tracker time to register it naturally. Minimum 5 seconds.

retryInterval.label: Retry Interval
retryInterval.tooltip: How often to retry inside one reannounce attempt. With Quick Retry enabled, this also becomes the cooldown between scans. Minimum 5 seconds.

maxTorrentAge.label: Max Torrent Age
maxTorrentAge.tooltip: Stops monitoring torrents older than this value (in seconds). Helps avoid endlessly checking old dead torrents. Minimum 60 seconds.

maxRetries.label: Max Retries
maxRetries.tooltip: Maximum consecutive retries in one scan cycle. Each scan can retry up to this count before waiting for the next cycle. Slow trackers may need up to 50 retries (7s interval is about 6 minutes). Range: 1-50.

quickRetry.label: Quick Retry
quickRetry.description: Use Retry Interval for cooldown instead of 2 minutes
quickRetry.tooltip: Uses the Retry Interval as cooldown between scans instead of the default 2 minutes. Useful when trackers are slow to register uploads. qui still waits for tracker updates and does not spam.

monitorAll.label: Monitor All Stalled Torrents
monitorAll.descriptionLine1: If enabled, monitors everything except excluded items.
monitorAll.descriptionLine2: If disabled, only monitors items matching the include rules below.

states.instanceNotFound: Instance not found. Please close and reopen the dialog.
states.activityWillAppear: Events will appear here when stalled torrents are detected.

activity.title: Recent Activity
activity.enabledDescription: Real-time log of reannounce attempts and results.
activity.disabledDescription: Monitoring is disabled. No new activity will be recorded.

toasts.instanceMissingDescription: Please close and reopen the dialog.

header.title: Auto-search on completion
header.noInstances: No instances configured. Add one in Settings to use this feature.
header.noActiveInstances: No active instances. Enable an instance in Settings to use this feature.
header.tooltip: Automatically trigger a cross-seed search when torrents complete downloading. Torrents already tagged <tag>{{tag}}</tag> are skipped.
header.description: Kick off a cross-seed search the moment a torrent finishes.

filters.searchAllEnabledIndexers: All enabled indexers will be searched.

states.failedLoadSettings: Failed to load settings. Please try refreshing the page.
states.failedLoadMetadata: Could not load categories and tags from qBittorrent. You can still type custom values.
states.failedLoadIndexers: Could not load Torznab indexers. Completion searches will use all available indexers.
states.noEnabledIndexers: No enabled Torznab indexers found. Enable at least one in Settings -> Indexers.
states.enableToConfigure: Enable auto-search to configure filters for this instance.

toasts.cannotToggleSettingsLoadFailed: Cannot toggle - settings failed to load
toasts.cannotSaveSettingsLoadFailed: Cannot save - settings failed to load

header.title: Reannounce
header.noInstances: No instances configured. Add one in Settings to use this service.
header.tooltip: qBittorrent does not retry failed announces quickly. When a tracker is slow to register a new upload or returns an error, you may be stuck waiting. qui handles this automatically while never spamming trackers.
header.descriptionSuffix: torrents and reannounces them when no tracker is healthy.

states.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search term or clear the filter.
states.activityWillAppear: Events will appear here when stalled torrents are detected.
states.enableMonitoring: Enable monitoring to start tracking stalled torrents.

header.title: Orphan Scan
header.noInstances: No instances configured. Add one in Settings to use this service.
header.tooltip: Finds files on disk that are not associated with any torrent in qBittorrent. Requires local filesystem access to be enabled for each instance.
header.description: Scans download directories and identifies orphan files for cleanup.

tooltips.localAccessRequired: qui and qBittorrent must run on the same machine. Enable Local Filesystem Access in instance settings to use orphan scanning.

preview.scanTruncated: scan was truncated, more files may exist

states.noScansYet: No scans run yet. Click Scan Now to find orphan files.

descriptions.skipTlsVerification: Allow connections to qBittorrent instances that use self-signed or otherwise untrusted certificates.
descriptions.localFilesystemAccess: Enable if qui can access this instance's download paths (required for hardlink detection in automations).
descriptions.qbittorrentLogin: Disable if qBittorrent bypasses authentication for localhost or whitelisted IPs.
descriptions.httpBasicAuthentication: Enable if your qBittorrent is behind a reverse proxy with Basic Auth.

alerts.torznabMissingDescription: Configure at least one enabled Torznab indexer before using RSS automation or seeded search runs.

auto.title: RSS Automation
auto.description: Poll tracker RSS feeds on a fixed interval and add matching cross-seeds automatically.

fields.rssIntervalHelp: Automation processes the full feed from every enabled Torznab indexer on each run. Minimum interval is {{minutes}} minutes to avoid hammering indexers.

placeholders.allEnabledIndexers: All enabled indexers (leave empty for all)
placeholders.selectTargetInstancesLoadCategories: Select target instances to load categories
placeholders.selectTargetInstancesLoadTags: Select target instances to load tags

helper.pickAtLeastOneInstance: Pick at least one instance to receive cross-seeds.
helper.allEnabledIndexersEligible: All enabled Torznab indexers are eligible for RSS automation.
helper.onlySelectedIndexersPolled: Only {{count}} selected indexer{{plural}} will be polled.
helper.onlySelectedCategoriesMatched: Only {{count}} selected categor{{suffix}} will be matched.
helper.onlySelectedTagsMatched: Only {{count}} selected tag{{plural}} will be matched.

recentRuns.title: Recent RSS runs
recentRuns.empty: No RSS automation runs recorded yet.

cancelRssRun.title: Cancel RSS run?
cancelRssRun.description: The current automation run will stop. Already-started work is kept.

header.title: Per-instance link mode
header.descriptionPrefix: Set how each instance injects matched torrents. Enable

fields.enableLocalAccessHint: Enable local filesystem access on this instance to use hardlinks/reflinks.
fields.hardlinkDescription: Use hardlinks when source and destination are on the same filesystem.
fields.reflinkDescription: Use copy-on-write reflinks when supported by the filesystem.
fields.baseDirectoriesHelp: Comma-separated list of base directories where hardlinked or reflinked files can be created.
fields.fallbackOnError: Fallback to regular mode on link errors
fields.fallbackHelp: If {{mode}} creation fails, continue with regular injection instead of failing the run.

toasts.baseDirectoryRequired: Set at least one base directory before enabling link mode.

header.title: Cross-Seed
header.description: Configure automation and manual runs for finding cross-seeds.

seededSearch.title: Seeded Search
seededSearch.description: Scan your seeded library and look for matches.

rules.title: Cross-Seed Rules
rules.description: Settings that apply to all cross-seed operations.

gazelle.title: Gazelle (OPS/RED)
gazelle.description: Enable direct API matching against Orpheus and Redacted. This runs alongside Torznab; OPS/RED Torznab indexers are ignored.
gazelle.enableHelp: Applies to all source torrents. If possible, qui also checks RED/OPS via Gazelle.
gazelle.redHelp: Used for redacted.sh lookups. Paste to replace; clear to remove.
gazelle.opsHelp: Used for orpheus.network lookups. Paste to replace; clear to remove.

matching.title: Matching behavior
matching.description: Control how torrents are matched and which file differences are allowed.
matching.sizeToleranceHelp: Maximum size difference for matching. Also sets auto-resume threshold (for example, 5% = resume at >=95%).
matching.crossSeedEpisodesHelp: Your local season packs can match individual episode torrents on indexers, letting you seed both formats.

safety.title: Safety & validation
safety.description: Control which matches proceed and protect your existing seeded data.
safety.skipRecheckHelp: Skip matches needing rename alignment, extra files, or disc layouts (BDMV/VIDEO_TS). When this is off, those matches are force rechecked by default.
safety.pieceBoundaryDisabled: Piece boundary safety check currently disabled
safety.pieceBoundaryDisabledHelp: Allow matches even if extra files share pieces with content. This may corrupt existing seeded files if content differs. Consider reflink mode instead.
safety.pieceBoundaryEnabledHelp: Matches are blocked when extra files share pieces with content, protecting your existing seeded files.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Control how cross-seeds are categorized in qBittorrent.
categories.reuseTooltip: Cross-seeds use the exact same category as the matched torrent. If the matched torrent uses AutoTMM, cross-seeds will too; otherwise the save path is set to match the original.
categories.reuseDescription: Keep the matched torrent category unchanged (no .cross suffix).
categories.affixTooltip: Creates isolated categories (for example, cross-seed/movie or tv.cross) with the same save path as the base category. Cross-seeds inherit AutoTMM from the matched torrent and are saved to the same location as the original files.
categories.affixDescription: Keeps cross-seeds separate from *arr applications to prevent import loops.
categories.indexerTooltip: Creates a category named after the indexer. AutoTMM is disabled; save path is set to match the original torrent. Useful for tracking which indexer provided each cross-seed.
categories.indexerDescription: Set category to the indexer name (for example, TorrentDB, BroadcasTheNet).
categories.customTooltip: All cross-seeds will be placed in a single custom category. AutoTMM is disabled; save path is set to match the original torrent.
categories.customDescription: Use a fixed category name for all cross-seeds.

tagging.title: Tagging
tagging.description: Configure tags applied to cross-seed torrents based on how they were discovered.
tagging.rssAutomationHelp: Tags applied to torrents added via RSS feed automation.
tagging.seededSearchHelp: Tags applied to torrents added via seeded torrent search.
tagging.completionSearchHelp: Tags applied to torrents added via completion-triggered search.
tagging.webhookHelp: Tags applied to torrents added via /apply webhook (for example, autobrr).
tagging.inheritSourceTagsHelp: Also copy tags from the matched source torrent in qBittorrent.

postInjection.title: Post-injection behavior
postInjection.description: Control what happens after cross-seed torrents are successfully injected.
postInjection.autoResumeTitle: Auto-resume after injection (when off, torrents stay paused for review)
postInjection.seededSearchHelp: Resume seeded search and dialog-injected torrents automatically
postInjection.externalProgramHelp: Optionally run an external program after successfully injecting a cross-seed torrent. Only enabled programs are shown.

scan.title: Library Scan
scan.description: Walk the torrents you already seed on the selected instance, collapse identical content to the oldest copy, and query Torznab once per unique release. If Gazelle is enabled, RED/OPS API matching is also attempted.

warning.title: Run sparingly
warning.description: This deep scan touches every torrent you seed and can stress trackers despite built-in cooldowns. Prefer autobrr announces or RSS automation for routine coverage and reserve manual scans for occasional catch-up runs.

placeholders.selectInstanceLoadCategories: Select an instance to load categories
placeholders.selectInstanceLoadTags: Select an instance to load tags

helper.intervalMinimum: Wait time before scanning the next seeded torrent. Minimum {{seconds}} seconds.
helper.gazelleOnlyRecommendation: Recommended 10s+; this is per-torrent pacing, and each torrent can trigger multiple Gazelle API calls.
helper.cooldownMinimum: Skip seeded torrents that were searched more recently than this window. Minimum {{minutes}} minutes.
helper.categoriesLoadAfterInstance: Categories load after selecting an instance; you can still type a category name.
helper.allCategoriesIncluded: All categories will be included in the scan.
helper.onlySelectedCategoriesScanned: Only {{count}} selected categor{{suffix}} will be scanned.
helper.tagsLoadAfterInstance: Tags load after selecting an instance; you can still type a tag.
helper.allTagsIncluded: All tags will be included in the scan.
helper.onlySelectedTagsScanned: Only {{count}} selected tag{{plural}} will be scanned.
helper.addInstanceToSearch: Add an instance to search the torrents you already seed.

indexerError.seededSearchRequiresTorznab: Seeded Torrent Search needs Torznab indexers (unless you are only scanning OPS/RED via Gazelle).
indexerError.rssRequiresTorznab: RSS automation runs require at least one Torznab indexer.

placeholders.torznabDisabledEnableGazelle: Torznab disabled; enable Gazelle or turn Torznab back on

help.selectedGazelleOnly: Selected indexers are OPS/RED-only; Torznab is skipped and Gazelle-only matching is used.
help.torznabDisabledGazelleChecks: Torznab is disabled. Matching will run through Gazelle API checks only.
help.torznabDisabledEnableGazelle: Torznab is disabled. Enable Gazelle or turn Torznab back on.
help.onlyOpsRedEnabled: Only OPS/RED Torznab indexers are enabled; use Gazelle APIs for these trackers.
help.noNonOpsRedTorznab: No non-OPS/RED Torznab indexers available. Torznab list is intentionally empty when both Gazelle keys are configured.
help.allEnabledNonOpsQueried: All enabled non-OPS/RED Torznab indexers are queried; Gazelle checks run in parallel.
help.allEnabledQueried: All enabled Torznab indexers are queried.
help.onlySelectedTorznabQueriedWithGazelle: Only {{count}} selected Torznab indexer{{plural}} are queried; Gazelle checks still run in parallel.
help.onlySelectedIndexerQueried: Only {{count}} selected indexer{{plural}} will be queried.

validation.selectAtLeastOneRssInstance: Select at least one instance for RSS automation.
validation.customCategoryRequired: Custom category is required when custom mode is selected.
validation.configureTorznabBeforeRun: Configure at least one Torznab indexer before running automation.
validation.selectInstanceBeforeRun: Select at least one target instance before running automation.
validation.automationAlreadyRunning: Automation run is already in progress.
validation.manualRunCooldown: Manual runs are limited to one every {{minutes}} minutes. Available in {{duration}}.
validation.pickInstanceBeforeRun: Select at least one instance before running RSS automation.
validation.saveRssSettingsBeforeRun: Save RSS automation settings before running to avoid stale targets.
validation.configureTorznabOrGazelleBeforeSeededRun: Configure Torznab or Gazelle before starting a seeded search run.
validation.enableGazelleBeforeTorznabDisabledRun: Enable Gazelle before running with Torznab disabled.
validation.enableRssAfterTorznabConfigured: Enable RSS automation only after configuring Torznab indexers.
validation.seededNeedsGazelleDescription: Enable Gazelle matching (OPS/RED) before running with Torznab disabled.
validation.seededNeedsTorznabOrGazelleTitle: Seeded Torrent Search needs Torznab or Gazelle
validation.seededNeedsTorznabOrGazelleDescription: Configure at least one Torznab indexer, or enable Gazelle matching for OPS/RED torrents.
validation.selectInstanceToRunAgainst: Select an instance to run against

webhook.title: Webhook / autobrr
webhook.description: Filter which local torrents are considered when autobrr calls the /apply webhook endpoint.

helper.onlySelectedCategoriesMatched: Only {{count}} selected categor{{suffix}} will be matched.
helper.onlySelectedTagsMatched: Only {{count}} selected tag{{plural}} will be matched.
helper.emptyFilters: Empty filters mean all torrents are checked. If you configure both category and tag filters, torrents must match both.

fields.dhtDescription: Distributed Hash Table for finding peers without trackers.
fields.pexDescription: Exchange peer lists with other peers.

fields.encryptionDescription: Protocol encryption helps bypass ISP traffic shaping.
fields.anonymousModeDescription: Hide your client identification and version.
fields.resolvePeerCountriesDescription: Show country flags for peers (requires additional bandwidth).

labels.fullPathToScriptWithArguments: Full path to script with arguments
labels.launchInTerminalHelp: When enabled, the program will open in a new terminal window. Disable for GUI applications or programs that do not need terminal output.
labels.pathMappingsHelp: Path mappings convert remote paths to local mount points. Useful when running external programs on a local qui server while qBittorrent is remote. Paths are matched by longest prefix first. Use the same path separator style as the remote qBittorrent instance (/ for Linux, \ for Windows).

header.description: Manage your application preferences and security

configuration.title: Configuration

securityCard.browserIntegrationDescription: Configure how your browser handles magnet links
securityCard.browserIntegrationHelp: Register qui as your browser's handler for magnet links. This lets you open magnet links directly in qui.

themeSelector.title: Theme Selection
themeSelector.description: Choose from available themes. Premium themes require a valid license.

toasts.unableVerifyLicenseDescription: License check failed. Premium theme switching is temporarily unavailable.
toasts.premiumRequiredTitle: This theme requires a premium license
toasts.premiumRequiredDescription: Open Settings -> Themes to see payment options and redeem your discount code.

states.licenseUnavailable: License verification unavailable. Premium theme switching is temporarily disabled.

states.noEntriesMatchFilter: No entries match the current filter

panel.logsDescription: Real-time application logs. Click a level badge to mute similar entries.

dialogs.deleteInstanceDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

toasts.instanceDisabledDescription: Enable the instance before testing the connection.
toasts.testFailedDescription: Could not connect to qBittorrent instance
toasts.instanceEnabledDescription: qui will resume connecting to this qBittorrent instance.
toasts.instanceDisabledLongDescription: qui will stop attempting to reach this qBittorrent instance.

instanceErrorDisplay.decryptDescription: Unable to decrypt saved password. This usually happens when the session secret has changed.

passwordIssuesBanner.title: Password Issues Detected
passwordIssuesBanner.description: Some instances cannot decrypt their saved passwords, likely due to a configuration change. Check the affected instances below to resolve this issue.

page.title: Backups
page.description: Manage torrent backups for your instances

heading.selectInstance: Select an instance to manage backups

message.noInstancesConfigured: No qBittorrent instances configured. Add an instance first to use the backup feature.
message.chooseFromDropdown: Choose a qBittorrent instance from the dropdown above to view and manage its backups.
message.noSupportedInstances: None of your qBittorrent instances support torrent backups yet. Upgrade to qBittorrent 4.5.0+ (Web API 2.8.11+) to enable this feature.

capabilities.unsupportedDescription: qBittorrent Web API 2.8.11+ (qBittorrent 4.5.0+) is required to export .torrent files for backups. This instance reports {{reportedVersion}}, so torrent exports are disabled.

nextSchedule.disabled: Automatic backups are turned off for this instance.
nextSchedule.selectCadence: Enable at least one automatic cadence to schedule backups.
nextSchedule.queued: Backup is queued and will start shortly.
nextSchedule.waitingScheduler: Waiting for the scheduler to pick up the next backup.
nextSchedule.waitingFirstBackup: Waiting for the first backup; scheduler will run ASAP.
nextSchedule.overdueRetry: Should have already run; scheduler will retry automatically.

enableBackups.label: Enable backups
enableBackups.description: Turn on automatic backups for this instance. Pick at least one cadence below; leave this off for manual-only backups.

includeCategories.label: Include categories
includeCategories.description: Group torrents inside the archive by their category

includeTags.label: Include tags
includeTags.description: Store torrent tags in the manifest

cadences.title: Automatic cadences
cadences.description: Hourly, daily, weekly, and monthly runs start after the previous backup finishes and their interval has elapsed. Leave them all off if you only trigger backups manually.

hourly.description: How many hourly snapshots to keep before older ones are pruned.
hourly.tooltip: Runs roughly once per hour when backups are enabled and at least an hour has passed since the last run.

daily.description: How many daily snapshots to keep before rotation.
daily.tooltip: Runs about once every 24 hours after the previous job finishes.

weekly.description: How many weekly snapshots to keep before rotation.
weekly.tooltip: Runs once the last backup is at least seven days old.

monthly.description: How many monthly snapshots to keep before rotation.
monthly.tooltip: Runs when the previous run is from an earlier calendar month.

validation.selectCadenceTitle: Select at least one cadence to enable automatic backups.
validation.selectCadenceBody: Select at least one cadence (hourly, daily, weekly, or monthly) before saving.
validation.changesApply: Changes apply to future backups as soon as you save.

modeHelp.incremental: Adds missing categories, tags, and torrents without touching existing data.
modeHelp.overwrite: Adds missing items and updates existing categories/torrents to match the snapshot.
modeHelp.complete: Same as overwrite, then removes anything not recorded in the backup.

options.autoResumeHelp: When enabled, torrents resume automatically if qBittorrent reports the restored data as fully checked. In other words, no data is missing.
options.autoResumeEnabledSummary: Torrents will resume automatically once qBittorrent reports the restored data as fully checked.
options.autoResumeDisabledSummary: Auto resume is off. Torrents stay paused until you start them manually.
options.enableSkipRecheckSummary: Enable skip recheck to allow automatic resume after verification.

states.noChangesRequired: No changes are required for this restore mode.

import.title: Import backup
import.description: Upload a backup archive (with torrent files) or manifest.json (metadata only). Archive formats: zip, tar.gz, tar.zst, tar.br, tar.xz, tar.

deleteAllDialog.title: Delete all backups?
deleteAllDialog.description: This removes every stored backup archive and manifest for this instance. This action cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Delete backup?
deleteDialog.description: This will remove the backup archive and manifest from disk. This action cannot be undone.

empty.currentPage: No backups on this page. Use pagination to go back.
empty.noneCreated: No backups have been created yet.

manifest.title: Backup manifest
manifest.selectBackup: Select a backup to view its manifest

licenseManager.title: License Management
licenseManager.description: Manage your theme license and premium access

access.unlockDescription: Pay what you want (min $4.99) • Lifetime license • All themes
access.activeDescription: You have access to all current and future premium themes
access.activationRequiredDescription: Your license needs to be activated on this machine

help.buyAndRecoverPrefix: Buy on DodoPayments, then enter your license key here. If you lose the key, recover it via the
help.polarInactivePrefix: This license is not active on this machine. Click re-activate to use it here. If you hit an activation limit, deactivate it on the other machine where it’s active, or manage activations via
help.dodoInactive: This license is not active on this machine. Click re-activate to use it here. If you hit an activation limit, deactivate it on the other machine where it’s currently active.

deleteDialog.title: Remove license?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove this license from this machine? This will deactivate it here to free up an activation slot.
deleteDialog.recoverPrefix: If needed, you can recover it later from your

addDialog.title: Add Premium License
addDialog.description: Enter your premium theme license key to unlock all premium themes.
addDialog.licenseKeyPlaceholder: Enter your premium theme license key

paymentDialog.title: Get Premium License
paymentDialog.cardMethodsDescription: Pay directly in DodoPayments. You will return to qui after payment.
paymentDialog.cryptoDescription: Crypto payment still completes in DodoPayments checkout.

cryptoSteps.donatePrefix: Donate using the addresses in the
cryptoSteps.applyDiscountCode: Open DodoPayments checkout, paste the code in Discount code, then click Apply.
cryptoSteps.confirmTotal: Confirm total is $0.00, then complete checkout.

paymentDialog.cryptoManualXmr: XMR is manual: reach out on Discord or email s0up4200@pm.me.
paymentDialog.findLicenseDescription: Your license key is shown after checkout. You can also recover it later from the Dodo customer portal.
paymentDialog.activateDescription: After checkout returns here, use Add License to activate your key.

toasts.paymentCompleted: Payment completed. Enter your license key to activate premium.
toasts.paymentNotCompleted: Payment was not completed. Try checkout again.
toasts.returnedFromCheckout: Returned from checkout. Enter your license key if payment succeeded.

header.title: Dashboard
header.description: Overview of all your qBittorrent instances

empty.allDisabledDescription: Enable an instance from Settings -> Instances to see dashboard stats.
empty.noInstancesDescription: Get started by adding your first qBittorrent instance

altSpeed.enableDescription: This will enable alternative speed limits for {{instanceName}}, which will reduce transfer speeds based on your configured limits.
altSpeed.disableDescription: This will disable alternative speed limits for {{instanceName}} and return to normal speed limits.

tooltips.totalSize: Total size of all torrents, including cross-seeds

tooltips.seededHelp: Uploaded ÷ Content Size — how many times you've seeded your content
tooltips.mergeIntoThisGroup: Merge selected trackers into this group

customizeDialog.descriptionEdit: Update the display name for this tracker.
customizeDialog.descriptionRename: Give this tracker a custom display name.
customizeDialog.descriptionMerge: Combine these trackers into a single entry with a custom name.
customizeDialog.deduplicateHelp: Uncheck duplicate tracker URLs to avoid counting the same torrents twice.

import.title: Import Tracker Customizations
import.description: Paste JSON to import tracker customizations (renames and merges).

validation.invalidDomains: Invalid entry: domains must be a non-empty array

trackers.messageHiddenInIncognito: Tracker message hidden in incognito mode

crossSeed.hardlinkTooltip: Files stored in hardlink directory (separate from source)

addPeers.title: Add Peers
addPeers.description: Add one or more peers to this torrent. Enter each peer as IP:port, one per line or comma-separated.

banPeer.title: Ban Peer Permanently
banPeer.description: Are you sure you want to permanently ban this peer? This action cannot be undone.

deleteSelected.title: Delete Selected Torrents
deleteSelected.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} {{noun}}?
deleteSelected.warningDeleteFiles: ⚠️ This will permanently delete the torrent files from disk!
deleteSelected.keepFiles: Torrents will be removed but files will remain on disk.

deleteCurrent.title: Delete This Torrent

deleteCurrent.warningDeleteFiles: ⚠️ This will permanently delete the torrent files from disk!
deleteCurrent.keepFiles: Torrent will be removed but files will remain on disk.

header.title: RSS
header.description: Manage qBittorrent's native RSS feeds and auto-download rules

warnings.processingDisabled: RSS feed fetching is disabled. Feeds will not be refreshed automatically.
warnings.autoDownloadDisabled: RSS auto-downloading is disabled. Rules will not automatically download torrents.

tooltips.reprocess: Re-check all unread articles against rules

empty.noInstancesDescription: Add a qBittorrent instance to manage RSS feeds and auto-download rules.
empty.selectInstanceDescription: Choose a qBittorrent instance to manage its RSS feeds and auto-download rules.
empty.noFeedsConfigured: No RSS feeds configured. Add a feed to get started.
empty.selectFeedToView: Select a feed to view articles
empty.noRulesConfigured: No auto-download rules configured. Add a rule to automatically download torrents from feeds.

toasts.rulesReprocessed: Rules reprocessed - unread articles will be checked against all rules
toasts.markAllReadFailed: Failed to mark all as read

renameFeed.title: Rename Feed
renameFeed.description: Enter a new name for this feed.

editFeedUrl.title: Edit Feed URL
editFeedUrl.description: Enter a new URL for this feed.

addFeed.title: Add RSS Feed
addFeed.description: Add a new RSS feed to monitor for torrents.

addFolder.title: Add Folder
addFolder.description: Create a new folder to organize your RSS feeds. Use backslash (\) for nested folders.

addRule.title: Add Auto-Download Rule
addRule.description: Create a rule to automatically download torrents matching your criteria.

addTags.title: Add Tags to {{count}} torrent(s)
addTags.description: Select tags to add to the selected torrents.

setTags.title: Set Tags for {{count}} torrent(s)
setTags.description: Select tags to set on the selected torrents.

setLocation.title: Set Location for {{count}} torrent(s)
setLocation.description: Enter a new save location for the selected torrents.

renameTorrent.title: Rename Torrent
renameTorrent.description: Enter a new name for this torrent.

renameFolder.title: Rename Folder
renameFolder.moveInfo: Renaming this folder moves all files inside it to the new path.

setCategory.title: Set Category for {{count}} torrent(s)
setCategory.description: Select a category from the list or create a new one.

createAndAssignCategory.title: Create New Category
createAndAssignCategory.description: Enter a name for the new category. It will be created and assigned to {{count}} torrent(s).

removeTags.title: Remove Tags from {{count}} torrent(s)
removeTags.description: Select which tags to remove from the selected torrents.
removeTags.noneFound: No tags found on the selected torrents.

editTracker.title: Edit Tracker URL - {{tracker}}
editTracker.descriptionPrefix: Update the tracker URL for all torrents using
editTracker.descriptionSuffix: This is useful for updating passkeys or changing tracker addresses.
editTracker.multipleUrlsHelp: Multiple tracker URLs found. Select the one you want to update.
editTracker.currentUrlNoDetectedHelp: Enter the complete tracker URL including the announce path.
editTracker.currentUrlSingleDetectedHelp: Pre-populated from detected URL. Edit if needed (e.g., different scheme).
editTracker.newUrlHelp: Enter the new complete URL (typically with an updated passkey).
editTracker.filteredModeHelp: This will update all torrents that have the exact matching tracker URL.
editTracker.convertHelp: Upgrades all http:// tracker URLs to https:// for this domain

shareLimits.title: Set Share Limits for {{count}} torrent(s)
shareLimits.description: Configure seeding limits for selected torrents. All three fields will be applied.

ratioHelp.custom: Stop seeding when ratio reaches this value

shareLimits.resolveMixedWarning: Select values for all mixed fields before applying

speedLimits.title: Set Speed Limits for {{count}} torrent(s)
speedLimits.description: Set upload and download speed limits in KB/s. Disable to use global limits.

tmmConfirm.description: Automatic Torrent Management will move files based on category settings. This may affect cross-seeded torrents sharing the same data.

locationWarning.title: Set Location for {{count}} torrent(s)?
locationWarning.description: Changing the save location will move files on disk. This may affect cross-seeded torrents sharing the same data.

header.title: Directory Scanner
header.description: Scan local directories for completed downloads and automatically cross-seed them.

warnings.noLocalFsAccess: No qBittorrent instances have local filesystem access enabled. Enable it in instance settings to use the Directory Scanner.

directories.title: Scan Directories
directories.description: Configure directories to scan for cross-seedable content.

empty.noDirectoriesDescription: Add a directory to start scanning.

runs.title: Recent Scan Runs
runs.description: History of recent scans for this directory.
runs.noInjections: No torrents were added or failed in this run.

resetDialog.title: Reset scan progress?
resetDialog.description: This deletes tracked dir-scan file state for this directory. The next scan will re-process searchees from the beginning.

settings.title: Directory Scanner Settings
settings.description: Configure global settings for directory scanning.

placeholders.noLocalAccess: No qBittorrent instances with local access

matchMode.label: Match Mode
matchMode.help: Strict mode matches files by name and size. Flexible mode matches by size only.

sizeTolerance.label: Size Tolerance (%)
sizeTolerance.help: Allows small size differences when comparing files (useful for minor repacks). Keep low for best accuracy.

minPieceRatio.label: Minimum Piece Ratio (%)
minPieceRatio.help: Only used for partial matches. Requires at least this % of the torrent's data to already be on disk.

maxSearchees.label: Max searchees per run
maxSearchees.help: 0 = unlimited. Useful for making progress across restarts.

ageFilter.label: Skip searchees older than
ageFilter.help: Uses file modified time (mtime). A searchee is skipped only when all files in it are older than the cutoff.

allowPartial.label: Allow partial matches
allowPartial.tooltip: Allows adding torrents even when the torrent has extra/missing files compared to what's on disk. qBittorrent may download missing files into the save path.
allowPartial.help: Useful for packs/extras; be careful if scanning your *arr library folders.

skipPieceBoundary.label: Skip piece boundary safety check
skipPieceBoundary.tooltip: When disabled, qui will block partial matches where downloading missing files could overlap pieces that include your already-present content.
skipPieceBoundary.help: Only relevant for partial matches. Disable (recommended) for extra safety.

startPaused.label: Start torrents paused
startPaused.help: Adds Dir Scan matches in a paused state (useful if you want to review before seeding).

defaultCategory.label: Default Category
defaultCategory.help: Category for injected torrents when the scan directory doesn't override it.

directoryDialog.addDescription: Add a new directory to scan for cross-seedable content.
directoryDialog.qbitPathPrefixTooltip: Optional path mapping for container setups. If qui sees files at /data/downloads but qBittorrent sees them at /downloads, set this to /downloads.
directoryDialog.categoryLoadError: Could not load categories from qBittorrent. You can still type a custom value.
directoryDialog.categoryHelp: Optional. When set, overrides the global default category for this directory.
directoryDialog.tagLoadError: Could not load tags from qBittorrent. You can still type custom values.
directoryDialog.tagsHelpPrefix: Added on top of the global Dir Scan tags. Suggested:
directoryDialog.tagsHelp: Added on top of the global Dir Scan tags. Suggested: <dirscanTag>{{dirscanTag}}</dirscanTag>, <needsReviewTag>{{needsReviewTag}}</needsReviewTag>.
directoryDialog.scanIntervalHelp: Minimum: 60 minutes (1 hour). Default: 1440 minutes (24 hours).

regularMode.title: Regular mode is enabled for this instance
regularMode.bodyOnePrefix: In regular mode, torrents point to your original files. This causes the orphan scanner to treat this directory as a scan root.
regularMode.bodyOneEmphasis: Any files not matched by a torrent will be flagged as orphans
regularMode.bodyOneSuffix: and could be deleted if auto-cleanup is enabled.
regularMode.bodyOne: In regular mode, torrents point to your original files. This causes the orphan scanner to treat this directory as a scan root. <emphasis>{{emphasis}}</emphasis> and could be deleted if auto-cleanup is enabled.
regularMode.bodyTwoSuffix: mode in instance settings to avoid this risk.
regularMode.bodyTwo: Use <hardlink>{{hardlink}}</hardlink> or <reflink>{{reflink}}</reflink> mode in instance settings to avoid this risk.
regularMode.acknowledge: I understand the risks of using regular mode with media directories

deleteDialog.title: Delete Directory
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this directory configuration? This will also remove all tracked files and scan history for this directory.

mobileShareLimits.title: Set Share Limits for {{count}} torrent(s)
mobileShareLimits.description: Configure seeding limits. Use -1 or disable to remove limits.

mobileSpeedLimits.title: Set Speed Limits for {{count}} torrent(s)
mobileSpeedLimits.description: Set upload and download speed limits in KB/s. Use -1 or disable to remove limits.

searchModal.title: Search Torrents
searchModal.description: Search by name, category, or tags. Supports glob patterns like *.mkv or *1080p*.

filterSidebar.instanceDisabled: This instance is disabled. Enable it from Settings -> Instances to use filters.

tips.content: Left click cycles include and neutral. Cmd/Ctrl + click or a long press toggles exclusion.

customFilter.title: Custom Filter
customFilter.activeExpression: Active custom expression filter (e.g., cross-seed results)

status.allEmpty: All statuses are empty. Click above to show them.
status.crossSeedHelp: Cross-seed filter is active. Uncheck to clear the filter.

categories.allMatchingEmpty: All matching categories are empty. Click above to show them.
categories.allEmpty: All categories are empty. Click above to show them.

tags.allMatchingEmpty: All matching tags are empty. Click above to show them.
tags.allEmpty: All tags are empty. Click above to show them.

toasts.trackerUrlUpdated: Updated tracker URL across all affected torrents

recheck.title: Force Recheck {{count}} torrent(s)?
recheck.description: This will force qBittorrent to recheck all pieces of the selected torrents. This process may take some time and will temporarily pause the torrents.

reannounce.title: Reannounce {{count}} torrent(s)?
reannounce.description: This will force the selected torrents to reannounce to all their trackers. This is useful when trackers are not responding or you want to refresh your connection.

header.title: Filter {{columnName}}
header.description: Set conditions to filter this column

reannounce.tooltip: Automatic tracker reannounce enabled - Click to configure

empty.noIndexers: No indexers configured. Add one to get started.
empty.noMatches: No indexers match the current filters

help.prowlarrIndexerId: Enter the numeric ID from the indexer details page in Prowlarr.
help.jackettIndexerId: Optional for Jackett. Leave blank to let qui derive it automatically.
help.basicAuth: Use HTTP basic authentication for Torznab behind a reverse proxy.
help.keepRedacted: Leave as <token>{{token}}</token> to keep existing password.

toasts.basicPasswordRequiredOrRedacted: Basic auth password is required (or keep {{redacted}})

descriptions.noInstances: Add instances to manage blocked cross-seed infohashes.
descriptions.main: Prevent specific infohashes from being injected on a per-instance basis.
descriptions.blockedHashes: Entries are applied only to the selected instance.

empty.noActivity: No active tasks or rate limits

toasts.deleteFailed: Failed to delete torrent creation task

group.helpText: This group applies only to this condition row. Use different groups on other GROUP_SIZE/IS_GROUPED rows if needed.

warning.deleteCrossSeeds: These cross-seeds will also be deleted

guidance.standalone: Open qui in a regular browser tab to register. The browser prompt may appear in the address bar, which PWAs hide.

guidance.chromium: In Chrome, this often appears as a small protocol-handler icon in the address bar. If nothing appears, enable handlers at chrome://settings/handlers.
guidance.default: If your browser prompts you, approve it to finish registration.

fields.proxyTypeDescription: Choose the proxy protocol used by qBittorrent traffic.
fields.proxyServerDescription: Hostname or IP address of your proxy endpoint.
fields.useAuthenticationDescription: Enable when your proxy requires username/password credentials.
fields.peerConnectionsDescription: Route peer-to-peer connections through the proxy.
fields.torrentsOnlyDescription: Use the proxy only for torrent traffic.
fields.hostnameLookupsDescription: Resolve peer hostnames through the proxy.

toasts.failedUpdate: Failed to update advanced network settings

alerts.unknownVersionDescription: We couldn't determine this instance's qBittorrent version, so every advanced setting is displayed. Some options might not apply to your environment.

fields.announceIpLabel: IP address reported to trackers (requires restart)
fields.announceIpDescription: IP address announced to trackers (leave empty for auto-detect)
fields.limitLanPeersLabel: Apply rate limit to μTP protocol
fields.limitLanPeersDescription: Limit μTP connections to prevent flooding LAN peers
fields.limitTcpOverheadLabel: Apply rate limit to transport overhead
fields.limitTcpOverheadDescription: Include protocol overhead in rate limiting calculations
fields.limitUtpRateLabel: Apply rate limit to μTP connections
fields.limitUtpRateDescription: Apply upload/download limits to μTP connections
fields.peerTosDescription: Type of Service byte for peer connections
fields.socketBacklogSizeDescription: Number of pending connections in socket backlog
fields.requestQueueSizeDescription: Maximum number of queued piece requests
fields.sendBufferWatermarkDescription: Upper watermark for socket send buffer
fields.sendBufferLowWatermarkDescription: Lower watermark for socket send buffer
fields.enableCoalesceReadWriteDescription: Combine adjacent disk reads and writes for better performance
fields.asyncIoThreadsDescription: Number of threads for asynchronous I/O operations
fields.filePoolSizeDescription: Maximum number of open file handles in pool
fields.diskQueueSizeDescription: Maximum bytes queued for disk I/O
fields.checkingMemoryUseDescription: Maximum memory used for piece checking
fields.hashingThreadsDescription: Number of threads for piece hash checking
fields.diskCacheTtlDescription: How long to keep cached data in memory
fields.workingSetLimitDescription: Physical memory working set size limit
fields.turnoverIntervalDescription: How often to perform peer turnover
fields.blockPeersPrivilegedPortsDescription: Block connections from peers using ports below 1024

errors.checkingMemoryUseRange: Outstanding memory when checking torrents must be greater than 0 and less than 1024
errors.peerTurnoverRange: Peer turnover must be between 0 and 100
errors.peerTurnoverCutoffRange: Peer turnover cutoff must be between 0 and 100
errors.peerTurnoverIntervalRange: Peer turnover interval must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than 3600 seconds

toasts.failedUpdate: Failed to update file management settings

fields.torrentChangedTmmEnabledDescription: Relocate torrent when its category changes (disable to switch to Manual Mode instead)
fields.savePathChangedTmmEnabledLabel: Relocate on Default Save Path Change
fields.savePathChangedTmmEnabledDescription: Relocate affected torrents when default save path changes (disable to switch to Manual Mode instead)
fields.categoryChangedTmmEnabledLabel: Relocate on Category Save Path Change
fields.categoryChangedTmmEnabledDescription: Relocate affected torrents when category save path changes (disable to switch to Manual Mode instead)
fields.useSubcategoriesDescription: Allow creating nested categories using slash separator (e.g., Movies/4K)
fields.startPausedEnabledDescription: New torrents start in paused state
fields.tempPathEnabledDescription: Download to temporary path before moving to final location
fields.tempPathDescription: Directory where torrents are downloaded before moving to save path
fields.torrentContentLayoutDescription: How torrent files are organized within the save directory

autorun.cardDescription: Run a command when a torrent finishes. Some instances also support running on torrent added.
autorun.runOnAddedDescription: Triggered right after a torrent is added to the client
autorun.programTip: Tip: wrap placeholders in quotes, e.g. "%N", to preserve spaces.
autorun.unsupportedDescription: Requires qBittorrent 4.5.0+ (Web API {{minWebApiVersion}}+). This instance reports {{reportedVersion}}.

alerts.limitedVersionDescription: We couldn't confirm this instance's qBittorrent build details, so all connection options are visible. Double-check applicability before applying changes.

fields.listenPortDescription: Port used for incoming BitTorrent connections
fields.upnpLeaseDurationDescription: Duration in minutes for UPnP lease (0 for permanent, libtorrent 2.x only)
fields.randomPortLabel: Use random port on each startup
fields.randomPortDescription: Randomly select a port when qBittorrent starts
fields.upnpDescription: Automatically forward port through your router
fields.bittorrentProtocolDescription: Protocol to use for peer connections
fields.utpTcpMixedModeDescription: How to handle mixed μTP/TCP connections
fields.networkInterfaceDescription: Currently active network interface. Configuration requires missing API endpoints.
fields.interfaceAddressDescription: IP address of the current interface. Configuration requires missing API endpoints.
fields.reannounceWhenAddressChangedLabel: Re-announce to trackers when IP address changes
fields.reannounceWhenAddressChangedDescription: Automatically re-announce when your IP address changes
fields.maxUploadsDescription: Maximum upload slots across all torrents
fields.maxUploadsPerTorrentDescription: Maximum upload slots per individual torrent
fields.enableMultiConnectionsFromSameIpLabel: Allow multiple connections from the same IP address
fields.enableMultiConnectionsFromSameIpDescript: Enable connections from multiple peers behind the same NAT
fields.outgoingPortsMinDescription: Minimum port for outgoing connections (0 = no limit)
fields.outgoingPortsMaxDescription: Maximum port for outgoing connections (0 = no limit)
fields.ipFilterEnabledDescription: Filter specific IP addresses from connecting
fields.ipFilterPathDescription: Path to IP filter file (.dat, .p2p, .p2b formats)
fields.ipFilterTrackersDescription: Also filter tracker connections based on IP filter rules
fields.bannedIpsPlaceholder:
Enter IP addresses to ban (one per line):
192.168.1.100
10.0.0.50
2001:db8::1
fields.bannedIpsDescription: Add IP addresses to permanently ban from connecting (one per line)

errors.listenPortRange: The port used for incoming connections must be between 0 and 65535
errors.maxConnectionsRange: Maximum number of connections limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
errors.maxConnectionsPerTorrentRange: Maximum number of connections per torrent limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
errors.maxUploadsRange: Global number of upload slots limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
errors.maxUploadsPerTorrentRange: Maximum number of upload slots per torrent limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
errors.outgoingPortsMinRange: Outgoing port range minimum must be between 0 and 65535
errors.outgoingPortsMaxRange: Outgoing port range maximum must be between 0 and 65535

fields.scanIntervalTooltip: How often to automatically scan for orphan files when scheduled scanning is enabled.
fields.gracePeriodTooltip: Files modified within this time window are skipped. This prevents deleting files that are still being written or processed.
fields.maxFilesTooltip: Safety limit for maximum files processed per scan. Helps prevent accidental mass deletions.
fields.previewSortTooltip: Controls how orphan preview results are ordered. The Max Files limit is applied after sorting.
fields.autoCleanupEnabledTooltip: When enabled, scheduled scans delete orphan files automatically without manual confirmation. Manual scans still show a preview first.
fields.autoCleanupEnabledDescription: Automatically delete orphan files after scheduled scans complete
fields.autoCleanupMaxFilesTooltip: Safety limit: if a scan finds more files than this threshold, auto-cleanup is skipped and manual review is required.
fields.autoCleanupMaxFilesDescription: If more files are found, manual review is required instead
fields.ignorePathsTooltip: Paths excluded from scanning. Files in these directories are never flagged as orphans. Enter one path per line.
fields.ignorePathsDescription: One path per line. Paths are matched as prefixes.

warnings.autoDeleteDescriptionPrefix: Files flagged as orphans are deleted automatically without manual review. If dir scan runs in regular mode, files in scanned directories that
warnings.autoDeleteDescriptionHighlight: are not matched by a torrent will be flagged as orphans
warnings.ignorePathsSuffix: are correctly configured, or use hardlink/reflink mode for dir scan.
warnings.autoDeleteAcknowledgment: I reviewed my settings and understand files will be permanently deleted

instance.title: Instance Configuration
instance.description: Configure connection settings, authentication, and access options

speed.title: Speed Limits
speed.description: Configure download and upload speed limits

queue.title: Queue Management
queue.description: Configure torrent queue settings and active torrent limits

files.title: File Management
files.description: Configure file paths and torrent management settings

seeding.title: Seeding Limits
seeding.description: Configure share ratio and seeding time limits

connection.title: Connection Settings
connection.description: Configure listening port, protocol settings, and connection limits

discovery.title: Network Discovery
discovery.description: Configure peer discovery protocols and tracker settings

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Performance tuning, disk I/O, peer management, and security settings

toasts.instanceEnabledDescription: qui will resume connecting to this qBittorrent instance.
toasts.instanceDisabledDescription: qui will stop attempting to reach this qBittorrent instance.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Instance
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

notFound.title: Oops! Lost in the swarm?
notFound.subtitle: Looks like you've ventured into the unknown.
notFound.bugPrefix: If this looks like a bug rather than a bad link,
notFound.recover: Otherwise, let us help you get back on track!

instanceRoute.instanceDisabledDescription: {{instanceName}} is currently disabled. Enable it from Settings > Instances to resume torrent management.

addRoute.selectInstanceDescription: Choose which qBittorrent instance to add this torrent to

errors.unableToOpenTorrent: Unable to open torrent file. Please try again.

searchPage.title: Search Indexers
searchPage.subtitle: Search across all enabled indexers. Pick a query type or leave Auto to have categories detected automatically.

indexers.label: Indexers: {{summary}}
indexers.sheetDescription: Pick which indexers to include in searches.
indexers.noneWithLinkPrefix: No enabled indexers available. Please add and enable indexers in the

placeholders.auto: Try: "Sample Movie 2024", "tt1234567", "tvdb 123456", or "Example Artist - Example Album"
placeholders.music: e.g., "Example Artist - Example Album", "Sample Band - Debut EP"
placeholders.xxx: Enter a specific adult release name

results.enterQueryPrompt: Enter a search query to get started

refreshDialog.title: Bypass the cache?
refreshDialog.description: This will send the request directly to every selected indexer. Use sparingly to avoid rate limits. You can refresh again after a short cooldown.

errors.addInstanceInline: Add a download instance under Settings > Instances.
errors.addInstanceUnderSettings: Add a download instance under Settings > Instances
errors.chooseInstanceToAdd: Choose an instance to add torrents
errors.enterQueryOrAdvanced: Please enter a search query or fill in advanced parameters
errors.noAdditionalInfo: No additional info available for this result
errors.noDownloadUrl: No download URL available for this result
errors.noEnabledIndexers: No enabled indexers available. Please add and enable indexers first.
errors.selectAtLeastOneIndexer: Please select at least one indexer

addTorrentDialog.title: Add New Torrent
addTorrentDialog.description: Add a torrent file or magnet link to start downloading

validation.fileRequired: Please select at least one torrent file
validation.urlRequired: Please enter at least one URL or magnet link

toasts.verifyInput: Please verify the torrent file or URL and try again.

form.urlsPlaceholder: Enter URLs or magnet links (one per line)
form.tagsPlaceholder: Create new tag or search available tags...
form.temporaryPathDescription: Download to temporary path before moving to save path
form.temporaryPathHint: Torrents will be downloaded here before moving to save path
form.autoTMMEnabledHint: Automatic Torrent Management is enabled. Save path will be determined by category settings.
form.renamePlaceholder: Leave empty to use original name

torrentCreatorDialog.title: Create Torrent
torrentCreatorDialog.description: Create a new .torrent file from a file or folder on the server

form.sourcePathHint: Full path on the server where qBittorrent is running
form.windowsPathHint: Windows users: use double backslashes (e.g., C:\\Data\\folder)
form.privateTorrentHint: Disable DHT, PEX, and local peer discovery
form.trackersHint: Select from your active trackers or paste custom URLs below
form.trackersSelectPlaceholder: Add tracker from your active torrents
form.startSeedingHint: Add the created torrent to qBittorrent and start seeding. If disabled, only creates the .torrent file for download.
form.torrentFormatHint: v1 for maximum compatibility, v2 for modern clients, hybrid for both
form.formatUnavailableTitle: Hybrid and v2 torrents are unavailable
form.formatUnavailableDescription: This qBittorrent build uses {{version}}, which only supports creating v1 torrents. Upgrade to a qBittorrent release built with libtorrent v2 to enable hybrid or v2 torrent creation.
form.pieceSizeHint: Auto calculates optimal size based on content
form.torrentFilePathHint: Where to save the .torrent file on the server
form.torrentFilePathTooltip: qBittorrent needs write access to this directory. Best to leave blank and download the .torrent file from the tasks modal later.
form.webSeedsHint: HTTP/HTTPS URLs where the content can be downloaded. One URL per line.

crossSeedDialog.title: Search Cross-Seeds
crossSeedDialog.noMatches: No matches found in your search.
crossSeedDialog.selectReleases: Select the releases you want to add

scope.title: Search Scope
scope.noTorznabIndexersHint: Add or enable Torznab indexers in Settings to search for cross-seeds.
scope.capabilityNoteDescription: These indexers lack the required capabilities/categories for this torrent and will be skipped by the server:

filtering.inProgressDescription: Checking your existing torrents to find duplicates and exclude redundant trackers. This helps avoid downloading the same content multiple times.
filtering.excludedDescription: You already seed this release from these trackers, so they're excluded from the search.
filtering.completedNoDuplicates: Content filtering completed. No duplicate content found on your enabled trackers.

rateLimit.whyDescription: Trackers limit request frequency to prevent abuse and bans.
rateLimit.tipFewer: Try searching with fewer indexers selected
rateLimit.tipRss: Use the RSS automation feature for ongoing cross-seeding
rateLimit.tipIndexers: Check the indexers page to see which ones are rate-limited
